Message:
After she pondered for a
few moments, I was silently
handed the papers.

The professor, who is also my
master, is often thought to be
unfriendly among her colleagues.

But I know she is just slightly
awkward.

Recently, her research
has not been going well,

and the exhaustion seems
to have caught up to her.

I poured her a cup of tea
to try and help her relieve
some of the fatigue,

but its contents have yet
to diminish.
